metadata.title: Node.js oracledb "ORA-21561 - OID generation failed" 解决方案

summary: 千辛万苦在虚拟机的`CentOS 6`下编译好`oracledb`,运行时报错 "ORA-21561 - OID generation failed"原因是虚拟机下的`CentOS`连接到 oracl
